task_description: Improve UI/UX design for Agent Portal Android app - enhance visual hierarchy, spacing, animations, iconography, and overall polish for professional appearance

patterns.color_naming: Semantic naming with Material 3 tokens: colorPrimary, colorSurface, etc. Custom colors use accent_[color] and accent_[color]_container format
patterns.theme_structure: Material 3 Dark theme base with custom Widget.Portal.* component styles. All components extend Material3 base widgets
patterns.card_pattern: MaterialCardView with 20-24dp corner radius, 0dp elevation (flat design), surface_elevated background, dividers between internal items
patterns.view_binding: Type-safe view access via ActivityMainBinding.inflate() in onCreate, no synthetic views
patterns.status_indicators: Oval shape drawables (10dp) with semantic color references (@color/status_on, status_off, status_warning)
patterns.vector_icons: 24dp vector drawables with consistent stroke width, white fill color for tintable icons
patterns.button_styles: Widget.Portal.Button.[Tonal|Outlined|Primary] with 16-18dp corner radius, textAllCaps=false, proper padding

existing_implementations.description: App uses Material Design 3 dark theme with comprehensive color system, custom component styles, and well-structured layouts. Status monitoring UI with cards, buttons, switches, and indicators already in place
relevant_files: app/src/main/res/values/colors.xml - Complete color palette with semantic naming
app/src/main/res/values/themes.xml - Material 3 theme configuration with custom widget styles
app/src/main/res/layout/activity_main.xml - Main UI layout with hero section, status cards, debug tools, connection info
app/src/main/java/com/agent/portal/MainActivity.kt - View binding pattern, status update logic, UI event handlers
